org.apache.polygene.api.composite

Interface TransientComposite

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Composite
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country, AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country1, AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country2, AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country3, MockComposite
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country1Mixin, AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country2Mixin, AbstractTimingCaptureTest.Country3Mixin

    public interface TransientComposite
extends Composite
    Transient Composite Type. TransientComposites have the following criteria;
    • Does not persist its state, and is not serializable
    • Can not be referenced from Properties, Associations, ValueComposites nor Entities
    • Can reference all types
    • No lifecycle
    • equals/hashCode is delegated to a single Mixin implementing the methods, like any other method
